thread.title: Zendaya Offered a Modeling Job to a Woman Who Was Body-Shamed on Twitter
thread.title_full: Zendaya Offered a Modeling Job to a Woman Who Was Body-Shamed on Twitter

title: Zendaya Offered a Modeling Job to a Woman Who Was Body-Shamed on Twitter
text:
By Kayleigh Roberts Jan 29, 2017 When it comes to taking down Twitter trolls, Zendaya slays . In her latest act of internet heroism, she simultaneously shut down a body-shaming troll and made his victim's biggest dream come true. All in a day's work when you're a total queen. Zendaya noticed the body-shaming happening and called out the person behind it, complimenting the woman and generally being awesome in her typical way. Stumbling across this is stupid shit, she is fine as hell head to toe and garunteed does't know you exist my man. As for her, slay on queen. https://t.co/7IKDJkaQ5F 
— Zendaya (@Zendaya) January 28, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below But then, Z took it to the next level and put her fans on the hunt for the woman who had been body-shamed so she could offer her a chance to model for her clothing line, Daya by Zendaya, Teen Vogue reports. Can we find her @....I'd love for her to be a @dayabyzendaya model珞
